settings.label: Theme accent
settings.info: Show on system status bar on mobile

settings.label: Show Images on Mega Menu Links
Swatch option name
settings.info: Exact match is required, including capitalization.

settings.content: If you have a multilingual store, please enter multiple options separated with commas. Example: Color,Colour,Fabre,Couleur

settings.label: Colors
settings.default:
Black:#000000
White:#f5f5f5
Blue:#005eff
Red:#c9002c
Pink:#ffd5e6
Brown:#a2896b
Olive:#808000
Purple:#dac6ef
Grey:#e2e2e7
Beige:#d8c7af
settings.info: One rule per line. Example: Blue:#005eff

settings.content: You have the option to add 2 or 3 colors for a single swatch. Example: Red&Blue: #c9002c#005eff
You can also add [image files](/admin/content/files?selectedView=all&media_type=Image) instead of using colors, in lowercase with spaces replaced by hyphens. Example: Green kaki: green-kaki.png

settings.label: Swatch style
settings.info: Portrait mode is only available for the variant image type.

settings.label: Enable "Sticky ATC"
settings.info: Quickly enable or disable this feature

settings.label: Show price under title on desktop
Show quantity field
settings.info: On mobile devices only show when product has single variant.

settings.label: Offset
settings.info: Adjust the offset value when showing the Sticky ATC section related to the main product form.

settings.label: Fill available space
settings.info: It will make card information to equal in height

settings.label: Swatch style
settings.info: Portrait mode is only available for the variant image type.

settings.label: Start Headline
settings.default: If you add (x) worth of products to your cart, you'll get Freeshipping!
settings.info: Use the special character '(x)' as a placeholder for the 'Goal' amount

settings.label: Middle Headline
settings.info: Use the special character '(x)' as a placeholder for the 'Remaining' amount

settings.label: End Headline
settings.info: Use the special character '(x)' as a placeholder for the 'Goal' amount

settings.label: Cart Upsell Product
settings.info: Note: Defaults to first variant of the selected product
